ModMetaData.name: Mines 2.0
ModMetaData.author: StatistNo1,Rebel_Rabbit,Cain
ModMetaData.description: This version of Mines mod makes it possible to mine modded resources from other mods. The Mines, a place for your pawns to excavate the treasures of the earth. This is a remake of the mod from AngleWyrm 1.3
